suggestions.suggestion: Add key_actors field to timeline entries based on entities_involved in events
suggestions.impact: Enables actor-centric timeline analysis and visualization

suggestions.suggestion: Create detailed sub-timelines for critical periods: 2025-06, 2025-04, 2025-05
suggestions.impact: Provides granular view of high-activity criminal periods

suggestions.suggestion: Map timeline events to specific paragraphs in 1-CIVIL-RESPONSE, 2-CRIMINAL-CASE, and 3-EXTERNAL-VALIDATION
suggestions.impact: Creates direct links between timeline and legal filings for evidence presentation

suggestions.suggestion: Add cumulative financial impact tracking to timeline entries
suggestions.impact: Shows escalation of financial harm over time

suggestions.suggestion: Add explicit phase transition markers (PHASE_1 → PHASE_2 → PHASE_3)
suggestions.impact: Makes timeline phases more visible and understandable
